title: 04/15/2021 - Hour 2 - Robert Woods
itunes:title: 04/15/2021 - Hour 2 - Robert Woods
description:
Chris Broussard and Rob Parker celebrate Jackie Robinson day and try to figure out if there's any other athlete that's as influential as Robinson, Los Angeles Rams wide receiver Robert Woods joins the show to talk about his time with the Rams and the Matthew Stafford trade, and the guys react to Carlos Rodon's near perfect game from last night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
